ComicInfo.Title: The Whole Shebang; Beyond the Night Across the Day
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-20 19:53:12. [CVDB24293] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 20:53:32. [Issue ID 38660]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Whole Shebang: Morgana finds the rest of her companions, who are drunk on 'nectar' and are battling strange creatures called weirdies and boogens.
Beyond the Night Across the Day: Skaggerak abducts Susie and puts her in Nightmare school.
ComicInfo.Writer: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Peter B. Gillis,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Peter B. Gillis
ComicInfo.Penciller: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Tom Sutton,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Tom Sutton
ComicInfo.Inker: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Bruce Patterson,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Bruce Patterson
ComicInfo.Colorist: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Kathryn Mayer,Bruce Patterson,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Kathryn Mayer,Bruce Patterson
ComicInfo.Letterer: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Kathryn Mayer,Janice Chiang,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Kathryn Mayer,Janice Chiang
